title: Mid- to Senior-level SEO and web optimization professional
job_overview:
About Us
Upgrade to see actual info is a boutique real estate platform focused on connecting buyers and sellers in Colorado’s scenic Western Slope. We're growing our digital presence and seeking a skilled SEO and Website Optimization Specialist to help us improve performance, drive engagement, and boost our visibility online.

Project Summary
We’re hiring a freelance expert to execute website improvement plan. Your role will be to optimize our WordPress-based website for search engines, enhance user experience, and install key tracking and engagement tools. This is a results-focused project with structured milestones and opportunities for ongoing work.

Key Responsibilities
Optimize website for mobile responsiveness and site speed

Audit and revise existing content to improve SEO, clarity, and engagement

Implement clear calls-to-action (CTAs) to increase conversions

Add a newsletter sign-up feature and integrate with email platform

Install and configure Google Analytics and Search Console

Connect tools like SEMrush or equivalent for keyword tracking

Integrate live chat functionality

Link relevant social media platforms for lead generation

Timeline & Commitment
Start Date: Immediately

Duration: 80 - 100 Hours, 20-25 Days, 4-5 Weeks

Daily Time Commitment: Minimum of 4 hours/day

Progress Updates: Daily

Ideal Candidate
3+ years in SEO, website optimization, or digital marketing

Strong understanding of WordPress, Google tools, and mobile UX

Experience optimizing local service or real estate websites

Familiarity with lead generation tactics and CTA strategy

Solid communication and progress reporting skills

Nice to Have 
Email marketing integration experience

Social media integration strategy

Prior work in real estate, property management, or local businesses

How to Apply
Please send:

Brief intro or cover letter

Portfolio or links to 2–3 relevant projects

Availability over the next 3 months

One suggestion you’d make after visiting Upgrade to see actual info

We’re a small, collaborative team looking for a reliable, proactive partner to help take our online presence to the next level. If that’s you, we’d love to hear from you!
